body: You must also add here some details about the product, for example, the product name.

It is a good practice to use only the global variables you need, it is better to use local variables as the local variables will be created when the method starts and destroyed when the method finishes, global variables will always occupy space in RAM memory while the activity is alive.

You have done a very good job with global variables in this project, just take this in mind for future projects :)
